summary: I want to journey with you!
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#1e84cc][size=5]Thank you for looking at my work！[/size][/color][/b]


[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/59550-1-1417099817.jpg[/img]

[size=5][b][ver1.2b]Update
[/b][/size]
Add voice to sienna
Voice is making with reference to the vanilla version
[b][size=3]recommended the introduction of Mod Organizer for beta
Also those who are Japanese of recommended use of SSLXLTN file of the same file
[/size][/b]
The main voice
when the follower
Some combat voice
Self-introduction

The undecided to either increase an additional

change of combat style
delete spell frostbite
Long distance ice spike
As short-range use more weapons

(Please refer to the save & load if the dialog does not exist)

This follower mod is standalone
[color=#ff0000][size=3][b]sienna can be found at the house clan battle-born left side bench in white run[/b][/size][/color]

She is body type is UNP, and her essential

She is good at ice magic and one-handed sword

She of vanilla version  will call me a hero of Sovngarde in shout

Dragon bone version she uses shout of the Dragon Aspect

[color=#ff0000]Dragon bone edition must have the "dragon born" Download content
[/color]
*Also steadily ongoing voice


[ver1.01]
small bug fix

[ver1.1]
Add cbbe Body Type(Also I can choose shout type)
Change to installer format

Arms man 60
Agile Defender 40
Blades man 60
Destruction Novice
